title: IZAHO JESOSY TIA ANAO

verses.1:
Misy tokoa ireo olona
Ma'tsiaro tsy tiavina
Halan'izao tontolo izao satria
Efa manaraka ny Tompo
verses.2:
Mety ho tia azy 'reo ianao
Fa izy ireo no tsy tia anao
Odiany tsy fantatr'aza
Fa efa manomboka mivavaka.
verses.3:
Matoa ny olona tsy mandray
Fa mankahala anao indraindray
Dia satria Jesosy efa tia
Sy nifidy anao ho Azy.
verses.4:
Tsy aleo ve manan'Azy
Ho Mpiandry sy Mpampianatra
Hiaro sy hitantan' anao
Toy 'zay hatoky tena ho Hendry

chorus:
O! henoy 'zao bitsika izao
"Izaho Jesosy tia anao"
Olombelona mety mandao
Fa Izy no momb'anao
